nodes.text: Tarrant Snil was an Imperial customs officer who worked in Lay Pa-Sidian on G'wenee. As part of his plan to ingratiate himself with Grappa the Hutt, Kir Kanos captured Snil under the guise of bounty hunter Kenix Kil. Upon returning Snil to Grappa, Snil was handed over to the ferocious Zanibar.
